TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreserveSigAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PreserveSigAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PreserveSigAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示應該要抑制 COM Interop 呼叫期間發生的 HRESULT 或 簽章轉換。

span.span: Indicates that the HRESULT or signature transformation that takes place during COM interop calls should be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性套用至方法。You can apply this attribute to methods. 根據預設， [Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)可確保呼叫可傳回 S_OK HRESULT 會轉換的 [out，retval] 參數作為函式傳回值。By default, the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) ensures that a call that returns an HRESULT of S_OK is transformed such that the [out, retval] parameter is used as the function return value. S_OK HRESULT 會被捨棄。The S_OK HRESULT is discarded. Hresult S_OK 以外，執行階段擲回例外狀況並捨棄 [out，retval] 參數。For HRESULTs other than S_OK, the runtime throws an exception and discards the [out, retval] parameter. 當您將套用managed 的方法簽章的屬性化方法的 managed 和 unmanaged 簽章完全相同。When you apply the to a managed method signature, the managed and unmanaged signatures of the attributed method are identical. 如果成員傳回多個成功的 HRESULT 值，而且您想要偵測不同的值，就需要將原始的方法簽章。Preserving the original method signature is necessary if the member returns more than one success HRESULT value and you want to detect the different values. 因為大部分的 COM 成員會傳回 HRESULT，藉由套用，您可以擷取整數，表示成功或失敗的 HRESULT。Since most COM member return an HRESULT, by applying the , you can retrieve an integer representing the success or failure HRESULT. Tlbexp.exe 會保留任何 [out，retavl] 參數做為 managed 簽章中的 out 參數。Tlbexp.exe preserves any [out, retavl] parameters as out parameters in the managed signature. [Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)也適用於此屬性，它將套用屬性至分配介面，當它匯入類型程式庫。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) also applies this attribute; it applies the attribute to dispinterfaces when it imports a type library. > [!NOTE] > 傳回型別的， ，和不會受到類別 COM 對 managed 程式碼就會發生互通性，並且標記為 managed 程式碼時類別。Return types of , , and are not supported by the class when interoperation occurs from COM to managed code and the managed code is marked with the class. 當您嘗試使用其中一個傳回類型與在這些情況中，類別就會擲回。When you attempt to use one of these return types with the class during these conditions, a is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何 Tlbexp.exe 轉換無的 C# 方法時將組件匯出至 COM 類型程式庫。The following example shows how Tlbexp.exe converts a C# method without when exporting an assembly to a COM type library. Managed 簽章：Managed signature: ``` int DoSomething (long l); ``` Unmanaged 簽章：Unmanaged signature: ``` HRESULT DoSomething ([in] long l, [out, retval] int * i); ``` 當您將套用為相同的 C# 方法和匯出組件，方法轉換不同於先前的範例。When you apply to the same C# method and export the assembly, the method conversion differs from the previous example. 請注意，Tlbexp.exe 會移除 HRESULT 和 [out，retval] 參數修飾詞。Notice that Tlbexp.exe removes the HRESULT and the [out, retval] parameter modifier. Managed 簽章：Managed signature: ``` [PreserveSig] int DoSomething (long l); ``` Unmanaged 簽章：Unmanaged signature: ``` int DoSomething ([in] long l); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
